abstract: While the changes to the Golden Globes are still sinking in, another set of trophies will be awarded on television tonight. But because of the writers’ strike, the People’s Choice Awards, from 9 p.m. to 11 p.m. on CBS, will resemble a news magazine more than an awards show.
lead_paragraph: While the changes to the Golden Globes are still sinking in, another set of trophies will be awarded on television tonight. But because of the writers’ strike, the People’s Choice Awards, from 9 p.m. to 11 p.m. on CBS, will resemble a news magazine more than an awards show.

headline.main: The People Choose While the Writers Strike
